name: John Doe
title: Managing Partner
bio: John is a seasoned investor with over two decades of experience in venture capital. He specializes in guiding startups from seed stage to successful exits.

name: Jane Smith
title: Investment Associate
bio: Jane brings a diverse background in finance and entrepreneurship to Penny Capital. She is passionate about identifying and nurturing promising startups.

name: Michael Johnson
title: Senior Analyst
bio: Michael is an analytical thinker with a keen eye for market trends. He assists in due diligence and investment strategy, ensuring Penny Capital's portfolio stays strong.

name: Emily Brown
title: Marketing Director
bio: Emily is a creative marketing professional who specializes in branding and communication strategies. She helps startups refine their messaging and reach their target audience.

name: David Lee
title: Finance Manager
bio: David is a detail-oriented finance expert who ensures Penny Capital's financial operations run smoothly. He manages budgeting, forecasting, and financial reporting.

name: Sarah Wilson
title: Operations Coordinator
bio: Sarah is the backbone of Penny Capital's operations, handling administrative tasks and ensuring the office runs efficiently. Her organizational skills keep everything on track.

name: Daniel Garcia
title: Technology Specialist
bio: Daniel is a tech enthusiast with expertise in software development and IT infrastructure. He implements and maintains the technology systems that support Penny Capital's operations.

name: Jessica Clark
title: HR Manager
bio: Jessica is a people-focused HR professional who ensures Penny Capital attracts, retains, and develops top talent. She fosters a positive and inclusive work culture.
